name: part_004
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら３周年 ⧸ 3DLIVE】Chu! Summer Party♪【ホロライブ】 [Di8D8BvZZp0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora and Himemori Luna perform 'Lovely Angel!!' on a tropical-themed stage.
Transition scene with black screen and logo animation.
MC segment where Himemori Luna congratulates Pekora and then quickly leaves.
Usada Pekora performs her solo song 'High Touch Memory'.

subtitles.original: あまにゅ！　Oh Happy! / チュン　チュン　チュン　ピュン　ピュン　ピュン
subtitles.english: Amaniu! Oh Happy! / Chirp chirp chirp, zoom zoom zoom

subtitles.original: あまにゅ！　Oh Lucky! / チュン　チュン　チュン　EVERY DAY
subtitles.english: Amaniu! Oh Lucky! / Chirp chirp chirp, EVERY DAY

subtitles.original: あまにゅ！　Oh Happy! / チュン　チュン　チュン　EVERY NIGHT
subtitles.english: Amaniu! Oh Happy! / Chirp chirp chirp, EVERY NIGHT

subtitles.original: Wow! La la la... / チュン　チュン　チュン　ピュン　ピュン　ピュン
subtitles.english: Wow! La la la... / Chirp chirp chirp, zoom zoom zoom

subtitles.original: ピュン　ピュン　ピュン　レッツゴー！　ハイッ！
subtitles.english: Zoom zoom zoom, let's go! Hey!

subtitles.original: 姫が来てやったのらー！ / ありがとぺこー！
subtitles.english: Hime is here for you, nanora! / Thank you, peko!

subtitles.original: ぺこぺこ先輩三周年おめでとうぺこなのら！ / ルーナたーん！
subtitles.english: Happy 3rd anniversary, Peko-Peko senpai-nanora! / Luna-tan!

subtitles.original: 会いに来たのら！じゃあ、またねー！ / ええっ！？
subtitles.english: I came to see you! Well, see ya! / Ehh?!

subtitles.original: 待って！早すぎぺこ！ / な、なになに？
subtitles.english: Wait! That was too fast, peko! / Wha- what is it?

subtitles.original: 寂しいぺこじゃん！1年に1度しか会えないコンビぺこらなんなのらね！
subtitles.english: I was lonely, peko! We're a duo that only meets once a year, Peko-Luna-nanora!

subtitles.original: ああ、そうだったのらね。1年ぶりなのらね。
subtitles.english: Ah, that's right nanora. It's been a year, hasn't it nanora?

subtitles.original: そうぺこなのらね！ちょっと、あまりにもさっぱりしすぎてびっくりしちゃったぺこ！
subtitles.english: That's right, peko-nanora! I was surprised because you were way too detached about it, peko!

subtitles.original: え、嫌われてるワンチャンあるぺこ？
subtitles.english: Wait, is there a chance you hate me, peko?

subtitles.original: そんなことないのらよ。ま、また来年！
subtitles.english: That's not it, nanora. Well, see you next year!

subtitles.original: ああー！ちょっとー！ルーナたーん！
subtitles.english: Aaaah! Wait! Luna-tan!

subtitles.original: いっせーのーで　君とだけ
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go! Only with you

subtitles.original: ハイタッチ☆メモリー / 作詞：ワタナベハジメ　作曲：高尾奏之介
subtitles.english: High Touch Memory / Lyrics: Watanabe Hajime  Composition: Takao Sonosuke

subtitles.original: もう少し眠りたいけど
subtitles.english: I want to sleep a little longer, but...

subtitles.original: もったいないよ　今日はサンデー
subtitles.english: It's a waste, today is Sunday

subtitles.original: 楽しいこと　やりたいこと
subtitles.english: Fun things, things I want to do

subtitles.original: With us　始めようよ
subtitles.english: With us, let's get started

subtitles.original: めぐりめぐる　君と
subtitles.english: Spinning and spinning with you

subtitles.original: 次のステージへ
subtitles.english: To the next stage

subtitles.original: 声を合わせ　扉開けて
subtitles.english: Harmonize our voices, open the door

subtitles.original: 駆け出せ　迷わずに
subtitles.english: Run out without hesitation

subtitles.original: 転んでも　かっこ悪くても　いいじゃない
subtitles.english: It's okay if you fall or look uncool

subtitles.original: Stand up　イメージもっと　重ねてゆく
subtitles.english: Stand up, let the images overlap more

subtitles.original: その先に
subtitles.english: Beyond that...

subtitles.original: いっせーのーで　君とだけ
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go! Only with you

subtitles.original: ハイタッチして　手叩いて
subtitles.english: Give me a high touch, clap your hands

subtitles.original: 奏でる　メロディを
subtitles.english: The melody we play...

subtitles.original: 合図に走り出せば　君となら　怖くない
subtitles.english: If it's the signal to start running, I'm not afraid with you

subtitles.original: ハイタッチして　手叩いて
subtitles.english: Give me a high touch, clap your hands

subtitles.original: 重ねる　そのメモリーは
subtitles.english: The memories we pile up...

subtitles.original: 明日へのエネルギー
subtitles.english: Are the energy for tomorrow

subtitles.original: 最高よ　もっと先へ
subtitles.english: It's the best! Further ahead

subtitles.original: 君となら　半端じゃない
subtitles.english: It's no joke if I'm with you

subtitles.original: あの日見た夢の続き
subtitles.english: The continuation of the dream I saw that day

subtitles.original: 追いつく　その日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day I catch up to it

subtitles.original: 涙なんて　振り切るくらい
subtitles.english: To the point of shaking off the tears

subtitles.original: もっと　スピードアップ
subtitles.english: Speed up even more

subtitles.original: どんな未来に　なっても
subtitles.english: No matter what the future holds

subtitles.original: 後悔しないよ
subtitles.english: I won't regret it

subtitles.original: 自分自身　選んだ道
subtitles.english: The path I chose myself

subtitles.original: 踏み出せ　迷わずに
subtitles.english: Step forward without hesitation

subtitles.original: 落ち込んで　進めなくなった時は
subtitles.english: When you're depressed and can't move forward

subtitles.original: Wake up　思い返す　夢見た　この時を
subtitles.english: Wake up, remember this moment you dreamed of

subtitles.original: Wow wow
subtitles.english: Wow wow

subtitles.original: 手と手で　奏でる
subtitles.english: With hand in hand, playing a tune...

subtitles.original: 映える　きらめく　夢を　君とだけ
subtitles.english: It shines and sparkles, a dream only with you

subtitles.original: ハイタッチして　その旅に
subtitles.english: Give me a high touch, on that journey...

subtitles.original: 繋がってゆく　心
subtitles.english: Our hearts will be connected

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないことを　気づかせてくれたよね
subtitles.english: You made me realize that I'm not alone

subtitles.original: ハイタッチして　手叩いて
subtitles.english: Give me a high touch, clap your hands

subtitles.original: 奏でる　そのメロディーが
subtitles.english: The melody we play...

subtitles.original: 世界に届くまで
subtitles.english: Until it reaches the world

subtitles.original: この夢は続いてく
subtitles.english: This dream will continue

subtitles.original: 君となら　半端じゃない
subtitles.english: It's no joke if I'm with you

subtitles.original: 一人で歩けない日は
subtitles.english: On days when you can't walk alone

subtitles.original: おんぶしてあげる　君を
subtitles.english: I'll give you a piggyback ride

subtitles.original: 空見て　そっちの方が
subtitles.english: Look at the sky, that way...

subtitles.original: 強く地面　踏み込める
subtitles.english: You can step on the ground even harder

subtitles.original: めぐりめぐる　日々を
subtitles.english: Spinning and spinning, through the days

subtitles.original: たどり夢見た　ステージへ
subtitles.english: To the stage I've struggled to dream of

subtitles.original: 届くその日を　見つめて
subtitles.english: Gazing at the day it reaches...

subtitles.original: 起こそう　君とだけ
subtitles.english: Let's make it happen, only with you

subtitles.original: 手と手を鳴らすたび
subtitles.english: Every time we clap our hands together...

subtitles.original: 小さなビッグバン
subtitles.english: A small big bang

subtitles.original: 無限の　その力を
subtitles.english: Receive that infinite power...

subtitles.original: 受けて進め
subtitles.english: And move forward

subtitles.original: ハイタッチして　手叩いて
subtitles.english: Give me a high touch, clap your hands

subtitles.original: 奏でる　メロディを
subtitles.english: The melody we play...

subtitles.original: 合図に走り出せば　君となら　怖くない
subtitles.english: If it's the signal to start running, I'm not afraid with you

subtitles.original: ハイタッチして　手叩いて
subtitles.english: Give me a high touch, clap your hands

subtitles.original: 重ねる　そのメモリーは
subtitles.english: The memories we pile up...

subtitles.original: 明日へのエネルギー
subtitles.english: Are the energy for tomorrow

subtitles.original: 最高よ　もっと先へ
subtitles.english: It's the best! Further ahead

subtitles.original: 君となら　半端じゃない
subtitles.english: It's no joke if I'm with you
